dramas.title: W.H.Y: What Happened to Your Relationship
dramas.description: A emotional rollercoaster about modern relationships, career struggles, and personal growth. Follow the journey of four friends navigating love and life in the digital age.

dramas.title: 100% Era - The Complete Season
dramas.description: Inspiring youth drama about chasing dreams against all odds. A group of university students discover their true passions while facing societal pressures and family expectations.

dramas.title: 18 Again - Fantasy Comedy Series
dramas.description: A 37-year-old man magically transforms back to his 18-year-old self. Hilarious situations ensue as he relives high school while hiding his true identity from family and friends.

dramas.title: 365: Repeat the Year - Mystery Thriller
dramas.description: Twelve people get a chance to travel one year back in time. But when mysterious deaths start occurring, they realize this opportunity might be a deadly trap in this suspenseful thriller.

dramas.title: A Bloody Lucky Day - Action Thriller
dramas.description: A taxi driver picks up a mysterious passenger who offers him a large sum of money for a long-distance trip. Soon he realizes his passenger is a dangerous serial killer.

dramas.title: A Good Day to Be a Dog - Romantic Fantasy
dramas.description: A woman cursed to turn into a dog every night finds her only hope in a man who fears dogs. Heartwarming romance with magical elements and comedic situations.

dramas.title: Breaking Bad - The Complete Series
dramas.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine to secure his family's future. The ultimate crime drama masterpiece.

dramas.title: Stranger Things - Season 1-4 Complete
dramas.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

dramas.title: Money Heist - The Professor's Plan
dramas.description: Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan.

dramas.title: Squid Game - Survival Drama
dramas.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes.

dramas.title: The Glory - Revenge Thriller
dramas.description: A woman who was a victim of school bullying plans her ultimate revenge on her tormentors after becoming the homeroom teacher of their children.

dramas.title: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
dramas.description: About an autistic lawyer with a high IQ of 164 who triumphs in the courtroom despite her social challenges and becomes a brilliant attorney at a top law firm.
